title: Malawi Debuts its Inaugural AI Center “CAIST,” Backed by U.S. Higher Education
description: In a historic stride towards technological advancement, Malawi University of Science and Technology launched its inaugural Centre for Artificial Intelligence and STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) on Friday. Backed by a collaboration with prominent U.S.-based universities, the Center, known as CAIST, sets the stage for Malawi’s foray into the world of artificial intelligence ... Read more
